location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of Eastern Saudi Arabia

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; black and red ink on linenDimensions: 146 x 135mm, on A4 sheet

mods.abstract: Sketch map in black and red ink depicting the area covered by the oil concession between the Government of Saudi Arabia and the Standard Oil Company of California, which was concluded in 1933.The map depicts the Hasa [Al Hasa] region of Saudi Arabia, as well as southern Iraq, Koweit [Kuwait] and Qatar.
